Headline: #80 Irving Park buses Temporary Reroute at Irving Park/Central
ShortDescription: 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Laramie, Addison, Central and Irving Park due to street blockage near Irving Park/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Laramie, Addison, Central and Irving Park due to street blockage near Irving Park/Central.

Allow extra travel time.
